channel.title: IPv6 Basics - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: This chapter covers the following exam topics: 1.0 Network Fundamentals 1.8 Configure and verify IPv6 addressing and prefix Introduction to IPv6 IPv6 increases the address to 128 bits in length. Older OSPF Version 2 Upgraded to OSPF Version 3: a newer version, OSPF version 3, was created to support IPv6. (Note: OSPFv3 was later upgraded to support advertising both IPv4 and IPv6 routes.) ICMP Upgraded to ICMP Version 6: ARP Replaced by Neighbor Discovery Protocol:
